Finally, Steve Ballmer spoke briefly of Microsoft's recently announced partnership with Nokia. He once again brought Nokia's chief executive Stephen Elop up on stage, who said that Nokia would support Windows to build strength versus the other mobile platforms . The first Nokia device running Windows Phone is expected later this year.

Iverson_Allen Iverson_Career_High_60pts_vs_the_Dwight Howard_Dwight Howard_Orlando_Magic_04/05 Three-time scoring champ hits career high Allen Iverson gave the crowd an electrifying performance to remember. Then the fans returned the favor with raucous ovations he won't soon forget. That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said. "You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there."

A Matter of Life and Death," Barbara Walters ' prime-time special airing tomorrow at 10 p.m. on ABC( Ch. 7). "It was very surprising," Barbara Walters says of David Letterman 's response. I was amazed and very happy. "Nor did he ever call me up[ afterward] and say,` Leave this out, leave that out.' Barbara Walters also interviews Bill Clinton , Robin Williams , Regis Philbin and Charles Grandison Rose III -- all of whom, like Barbara Walters herself, underwent open-heart surgery. Barbara Walters , 81, had a faulty heart valve replaced last May.
